title: #63: Battling Addiction with Faye Evarts and Johnny Cheek - A conversation about the struggle of drug addiction
itunes:title: #63: Battling Addiction with Faye Evarts and Johnny Cheek - A conversation about the struggle of drug addiction
description:
Lauryn's sister Faye Evarts joins Lauryn & Michael to share her personal journey with battling addiction. From a teenager who never thought she would ever use drugs, to becoming at one point and time homeless & dependent on illegal substances, Faye has completely turned her life around and is here to share her story. We also hear from Johnny Cheek, Faye's significant other, who has battled addiction as well. Johnny shares his story in-which he battled drugs, had multiple stints in jail and has since turned it all around, and now has a beautiful family and a business of his own.

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE

This episode is brought to you by The Skinny Confidential Bombshell Body Guide and Meal plan.
